title: Modernized, cohesive UI theme refresh (global tokens, shell, Dashboard + Login)

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive modern theme across all pages by updating global CSS theme tokens and aligning spacing/typography/shadows/interactive states using existing Tailwind + shadcn/ui composition (no ui component edits).
acceptanceCriteria: A cohesive visual theme is applied across the entire app (no page looks like an older style compared to others).
Global theme tokens (CSS variables) are updated in frontend/src/index.css for both light and dark mode.
Primary/secondary/accent colors, borders, muted text, and background colors look intentionally designed (not default) and remain readable with sufficient contrast.
Cards, tables, and dialogs use a consistent radius, shadow, and padding system.
Buttons, inputs, selects, and tabs have improved hover/focus styles consistent with the new theme.

file_operations.description: Refresh light/dark CSS variable tokens (background/foreground/card/border/muted/accent/primary/ring/radius) and base element defaults to achieve a more premium, consistent look across the app (e.g., refined contrast, softer surfaces, better focus ring).

Align Tailwind theme extensions (e.g., shadows, borderRadius, ring/alpha usage) with the updated CSS tokens so cards/dialogs/buttons/inputs consistently render modern depth and hover/focus states across pages.

Adjust page-level composition (headers, cards, and search section) to match the updated theme: consistent spacing, typography hierarchy, and modern hover/focus affordances via className/props only (do not edit frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update page-level layout spacing and section styling (header, filter card nesting, tabs/select/input wrappers) to match the new theme with consistent padding, shadows, and interactive states via className/props only (do not edit frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Refine To-Do page surface styling (list rows/cards, header hierarchy, buttons) so it matches the modern theme (consistent radius/shadow/padding and hover/focus states) via className/props only (do not edit frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update Team page card grid and empty state styling to align with the refreshed theme (typography, spacing, subtle depth) via className/props only (do not edit frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Align Public Search page styling (inputs, results sections/tables/cards) with the new global theme tokens and interaction states using className/props only (do not edit frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Refresh MainLayout shell styling (sidebar/header/footer) for a premium look with clearer navigation states while keeping responsiveness and toggle behavior intact.
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar and header styling in frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx are updated to match the new theme (backgrounds, borders, spacing, and typography).
Active navigation item is visually distinct in a stylish way (not just a flat color block), and hover states are clearly visible.
Layout remains responsive: sidebar toggle works and the app remains usable on smaller screens.
Footer styling matches the updated theme and does not visually clash with the main content.

file_operations.description: Redesign sidebar/header/footer presentation using the updated theme tokens: improve spacing, typography, and add modern navigation affordances (active item treatment with subtle depth/ring/gradient, clearer hover states), while preserving existing sidebar toggle responsiveness and page switching logic. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Modernize Dashboard and Login page styling to reflect the new theme (hierarchy, icons, subtle depth/background treatments) without changing any existing behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard cards/sections (frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx) look more modern through improved spacing, typography scale, and consistent icon/badge styling.
Login page (frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx) styling is aligned with the new theme and feels premium (background, card styling, and typography).
No functional behavior changes: all existing buttons/flows still work as before (login, navigation, export buttons, etc.).

file_operations.description: Refine Dashboard visual hierarchy and card styling (consistent icon containers, badge treatments, spacing scale, section headers, subtle gradients/shadows) by composing existing shadcn/ui components via className/props only (no functionality changes, no ui component edits). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update Login page to feel more premium (background treatment, hero + login card depth, typography hierarchy, button/outline styling) using className/props only while preserving login/public-search behaviors. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
